attributes.action: Fund a free, nationwide 'Parental Control App' to keep all children safe online
attributes.additional_details: There are many parental control apps that monitor activity, block websites, filter words & website searches, block apps, put time limits on apps etc. We thin these enable young people to be able to access the online world in a healthy way, whilst giving parents the tools to parent in both the online and real world. We believe that funding a nationwide app that provides parental controls for free would make all the difference to young people's wellbeing.
attributes.background: We believe there is a national mental health crisis with young people that is largely connected to increased time online, social media advances and algorithms. We believe this is having a devastating impact on young people’s physical and emotional development, and their safety.

departments.name: Department for Culture, Media and Sport
